name: Chris Feller's Big Day | A Mouse Trap Story
name_original: Chris Feller's Big Day | A Mouse Trap Story
description: This side story explores a day in the life of Chris when Warren falls ill and leaves his roommate on his own to take a job. Through trials and tribulations, you'll guide Chris through a labyrinth of choices in order to complete the job correctly, can you single handedly keep Chris out of hot water?
